CIP codes of predefined groups of programs

For several groups of programs, CIP codes have been collected in predefined character vectors that can be used as the series argument in filter_cip().

series_engr

series_hum

series_math

series_sci

series_socsci

Format

A character vector

Examples

length(series_engr)
#> [1] 1
series_engr
#> [1] "14"

length(series_hum)
#> [1] 9
series_hum
#> [1] "16"   "23"   "24"   "38"   "39"   "50"   "54"   "3013" "3022"

length(series_math)
#> [1] 2
series_math
#> [1] "27"   "3008"

length(series_sci)
#> [1] 6
series_sci
#> [1] "26"   "3001" "40"   "3018" "3024" "3027"

length(series_socsci)
#> [1] 17
series_socsci
#>  [1] "05"   "09"   "13"   "19"   "22"   "25"   "36"   "42"   "43"   "44"  
#> [11] "45"   "3005" "3015" "3020" "3021" "3023" "3026"

Contents
